headline: Nucor (NUE) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Nucor (NUE) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Nucor (NUE) Misses Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Nucor (NUE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -5.15% and +0.10%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Nucor shares drop as fourth quarter earnings miss estimates
summary: Investing.com -- Nucor Corp (NYSE:NUE) reported fourth quarter adjusted earnings of $1.73 per share, falling short of analyst expectations of $1.86, while revenue came in at $7.69 billion, below the consensus estimate of $7.87 billion. The steel producer’s shares dropped 3.2% in after-hours trading Monday following the earnings miss.

headline: Nucor: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had profit of $1.64 per share. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs, were $1.73 per share. The results missed Wall Street expectations.

headline: Nucor Reports Results for the Fourth Quarter of 2025
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) today announced consolidated net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders of $378 million, or $1.64 per diluted share, for the fourth quarter of 2025. Excluding impairment charges taken during the quarter, Nucor's fourth quarter of 2025 adjusted net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders were $400 million, or $1.73 per diluted share. headline: Steel Dynamics Falls on Earnings Beat. It Still Offers Hope for the Sector in 2026.
summary: Steel Dynamics’  stock jumped—and then fell—after the company posted better-than-expected earnings, and its management offered some optimism for the sector in the new year.  A year ago, Steel Dynamics reported EPS of $1.36.  Steel prices always move steel company earnings.

headline: Nucor: 15% Upside Potential Driven By Investment Completion And Strategic Growth
summary: Nucor has solid upside potential reinforced by strong US steel demand, a robust backlog, and positive analyst sentiment.

headline: Meta Earnings, Fed Decision, Venezuela Testimony: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season is in full throttle, with results expected from big-name companies including UnitedHealth, Chevron and Boeing. A quartet of tech giants—Apple, Meta Platforms, Microsoft and Tesla—will also report results.
